name: Puzzle Shuffle
overview: A puzzle game created by Dave Hogendorf and Patrick Witteman and published in Golden Disk 64 #11 (1990). The puzzle game for bright minds and quick combiners. A game against time! After starting through the main menu you get directly into the game. The computer then immediately mixes the individual building blocks of the graphic in the upper right corner. Now you have to try to restore the original picture by moving the parts of the picture in as few moves as possible. To do this, use the joystick. The display on the left shows the time remaining, as well as the number of points achieved and the high score
